effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Hits three times in the same turn. The second hit has double power, and the third hit has triple power. Each hit has a separate accuracy check, and this move stops if a hit misses. skill link does not apply.

short_effect.sun_moon: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successful hit.
